Player: Are you alright? You look like you’ve seen better days.

Thief: I could be worse. Last thing I remember I was downing my thirdfourthfifth beer, and next thing I know I’m here. And they said I stole something! I know I don’t remember shit, but I know I’m innocent!

Thief?: I’m gonna get a drink. Straight after I prove I’m not guilty.
